definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[רהט]] (√ of foll., prob. collect, gather, cf. AR. rahat.a 1, VIII. be collected, congregated, cf. Nö:ZA xii. 186; Targum [[רָטַיָּא]] = [[רְהָטִים]], Ge 30:38, Ge 30:41, Ex 2:16; Syr. roht.o0 is appar. conduit, also reservoir (?); As. râṭu, vessel for water, provisions, etc.).
